meanings.definition: A person who is insane or wildly chaotic.
meanings.sent1: The bedlamites in the asylum were shouting and running around.
meanings.sent2: The town square was filled with bedlamites causing a commotion.
meanings.sent3: The bedlamites at the party were dancing on tables and singing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The classroom turned into a group of bedlamites when the teacher stepped out.
meanings.sent5: The old mansion was rumored to be haunted by bedlamites who roamed the halls at night.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are behaving in a wild or chaotic manner.
meanings.sent1: The bedlamites at the concert were jumping and cheering with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The protesters turned into bedlamites, shouting slogans and waving signs.
meanings.sent3: The children at the birthday party became bedlamites when the piñata broke open.
meanings.sent4: The marketplace was a sea of bedlamites, bargaining and haggling for goods.
meanings.sent5: The sports fans erupted into bedlamites when their team scored the winning goal.
